#
# Testing --ignore-file with doublestar expander
#
exec badger --show-totals text *.txt
stdout '^INFO: files tested: 1$'

exec badger --ignore-file= --show-totals text *.txt
stdout '^INFO: files tested: 2$'

exec badger --show-totals text **/*.txt
stdout '^INFO: files tested: 2$'

exec badger --ignore-file= --show-totals text **/*.txt
stdout '^INFO: files tested: 4$'

#
# Testing --ignore-file with golang expander
#
exec badger --show-totals --glob=golang text *.txt
stdout '^INFO: files tested: 1$'

exec badger --ignore-file= --show-totals --glob=golang text *.txt
stdout '^INFO: files tested: 2$'

exec badger --show-totals --glob=golang text *.txt */*.txt
stdout '^INFO: files tested: 2$'

exec badger --ignore-file= --show-totals --glob=golang text *.txt */*.txt
stdout '^INFO: files tested: 4$'
